attributes.action: Cut Britain's population to 30 million people so people can enjoy an optimum quality of life whilst preserving the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Academics calculate that 30 million would be an optimum population for Britain. It would allow us greater self-sufficiency and reduce pollution and hopefully ease global warming. Road pricing and congestion charging could be abandoned and overcrowded roads, trains, airports, prisons etc would diminish. Young people would have better housing choice. Measures like stopping net immigration with public education and tax changes that encourage smaller families could achieve this painlessly and there would still be enough people around to make friends with.
Insist on quality of life not quantity !
